name: Apex Helicopters
about: Apex Helicopters is a premier flight training institution and aerial services provider based in Florence, Oregon. We offer advanced helicopter flight training, including turbine transitions, external load, vertical reference, off airport, and mountain flying. Our training programs are designed to be cost-effective and personalized, focusing on a limited number of students to ensure the best possible instruction. Apex Helicopters utilizes the reliable Bell 206B-3 JetRanger and Airbus AS350B-3 Astar helicopters, equipped with state-of-the-art navigation and safety equipment. We are committed to providing safe, efficient, and experienced aerial services, supporting various industries including air tours, wildlife surveys, and wildfire suppression. Our experienced crew and proactive project planning ensure that all services are delivered safely and successfully.
